meaningMnemonic: We're going to need to <kanji>examine</kanji> and <kanji>inspect</kanji> you for our annual <vocabulary>checkup</vocabulary>, mmk? Now drop your pants and cough, please.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
